donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGO
outputs.output_descr: The Project aims at implementing energy efficiency measures in at least two municipal buildings in order to showcase the practice and benefits of energy efficiency, strengthening the capacities of the municipal authorities for energy management, and upgrade the national software for municipal energy management.
outputs.output_title: Energy Mng at the local level

project_descr: The project aims at improving energy efficiency on a municipal level and enhanced awareness and capacities of stakeholders involved in municipal energy management issues.
project_title: Energy Management at the local level
